snippet.title: Pokémon TCG Pocket: Shining Revelry | Official Trailer
snippet.description: It’s time to shine in Pokémon Trading Card Game Pocket with the impending release of the game’s next expansion, Shining Revelry, on March 26, 2025, at 10:00 p.m. PDT. Uniquely colored Shiny Pokémon are debuting alongside Pokémon originally discovered in the Paldea region. Shining Revelry features over 110 cards including exciting Pokémon ex, new Trainers, and a gorgeous immersive card  ready to pull you into the wondrous world of Pokémon. Take a sneak peek below at some cards you can expect to see in the new expansion.
